document_name: Project Document SACBIH final V1 - new as of 2009 - substantive revision.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BIH/00037913/Project Document SACBIH final V1 - new as of 2009 - substantive revision.doc

outputs.output_descr:
The UNDP's SACBiH is designed to have the impact of:

- Reducing the development and security risks posed by proliferation, high levels and instability of SALW, ammunition and explosives by destroying surplus and unstable stocks and upgrading the current ammunition disposal capacities.
- Reducing the ammunition storage and safeguarding requirements of the AFBiH in support of the defence reforms and completion of AFBIH personnel transition.
- Enhancing the BiH government authorities' capacity to increase and exercise improved SALW control.
- Sensitizing the BiH population through the public and media information activities that will be launched to increase awareness and understanding of citizens of the dangers posed by ammunition and SALW. 
- Supporting the fulfillment of the requirements created by the restructuring process of the AFBiH.  
- Support to improved industrial productivity in BiH through jobs increases at the demilitarisation facilities 
- Increasing security conditions within selected municipalities.

The above impacts will lead to attaining several important socio-economic, development and security results.  The most important of these are increasing human security for communities in Bosnia and Herzegovina and releasing government resources used for stockpile management thereby enabling them to be invested in other priority public sectors.

The project is based on three distinct outputs:

1. Increased national capability for ammunition control through enhanced capacities for environmentally benign ammunition destruction and stockpile management;

2. Enhanced capacities of the state, entity and Brcko District institutions to control and manage weapons possession, collection and disposal in line with international standards;

3. Capabilities of municipal and law enforcement authorities enhanced to ensure consummate improvement of community security and security perception of citizens in selected municipalities.

project_descr: Small Arms and Ammunition Reduction Programme
